messages.message:
Hey, anyone else seeing the following in the `CustomizeHome` step?
```Fatal: rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = connection error: desc = "error reading server preface: read unix @->/run/mesh.system/bridged:internal-tcp.sock: use of closed network connection".
...
Failed to connect to configured Instabase cluster       {"error": "'/opt/sandboxd/bin/cs k8s intercept start --reset --ingress-disable-auth --namespace intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase --infra crafting-aihub --ingress crafting-aihub:svc/intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase/service-server-nginx:443' failed with exit status 1"}```

Hey there, this looks a lot like the interception issue from a couple days ago (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1741384182730119?thread_ts=1741374254.519599&cid=C05L87V014J), I'll see if I can cycle those services to bring things back up
@Liam Callanan / @ayesha.ali this should be resolved now, can you confirm whether things appear to be working from your end?
